headline.print_headline: Popularity of Peru's Humala Climbs for Second Straight Month
headline.main: Popularity of Peru's Humala Climbs for Second Straight Month

lead_paragraph: Peruvian President Ollanta Humala's popularity rose 4 points for the second month in a row in August, climbing from a record low in June to reach 29 percent after a tough-talking minister was appointed to tackle crime, according to poll results on Sunday.
